name: node-forge
description: JavaScript implementations of network transports, cryptography, ciphers, PKI, message digests, and various utilities.

scripts.coverage: rm -rf coverage && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -u exports -t 30000 -R spec tests/unit/index.js
scripts.coverage-lcov: rm -rf coverage && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -u exports -t 30000 -R spec tests/unit/index.js
scripts.jscs: jscs *.js lib/*.js tests/*.js tests/unit/*.js tests/legacy/*.js tests/issues/*.js tests/websockets/*.js
scripts.jshint: jshint *.js lib/*.js tests/unit/*.js tests/legacy/*.js tests/issues/*.js tests/websockets/*.js
scripts._jscs: jscs *.js lib/*.js tests/*.js tests/unit/*.js tests/legacy/*.js tests/issues/*.js tests/websockets/*.js
scripts._jshint: jshint *.js lib/*.js tests/*.js tests/unit/*.js tests/legacy/*.js tests/issues/*.js tests/websockets/*.js
